QueryResult.text: SELECT PGMG.PROJECT_GROUP_ID, PGMG.ID, 'GROUP', PGMG.GROUP_NAME, '', '', '', LANGUAGE_CODE FROM CLB_PROJ_GRP_MEMBER_GRPS_V PGMG UNION SELECT MEMBER.GROUP_ID, MEMBER.USER_ID, 'USER', MEMBER.LAST_NAME, MEMBER.FIRST_NAME, MEMBER.USER_NAME, MEMBER.EMAIL_ADDRESS, 'NULL' FROM CLB_GROUP_MEMBERS_V MEMBER
